title: Battle of the Sexes 'brought eyes on tennis'
summary: Women's world number one Aryna Sabalenka defends the 'Battle of the Sexes' match against Nick Kyrgios after opening her season with a crushing win in Brisbane.

title: Realme 16 Pro+ in for review

summary: Steve Smith thwarts England again during the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney to leave only the great Sir Don Bradman ahead in terms of Ashes runs scored.

summary: According to a new rumor, vivo will be launching the X200T in India in the last week of this month. The phone will have "aggressive pricing", starting around INR 50,000 to INR 55,000. summary: Realme 16 Pro+ is the first major release from the brand in 2026, and it brings an updated design with a clear focus on cameras. summary: Last month RedMagic confirmed that it's working on the 11 Air, the successor to the RedMagic 10 Air launched back in April. This is the successor to the Snapdragon X Plus from September 2024. The Snapdragoâ€¦

title: AMDâ€™s Ryzen 7 9850X3D promises 7% uplift over Ryzen 7 9800X3D â€“ AMD fights itself with â€˜new fastest gaming processorâ€™
summary: The long-rumored Ryzen 7 9850X3D is official, but AMDâ€™s own benchmarks paint an underwhelming picture for performance gains.

summary: AMDâ€™s new Ryzen AI 400 â€˜Gorgon Pointâ€™ APUs are primarily driven by a clock speed bump, featuring similar silicon as the previous generation otherwise.

title: Boundaries, drops and no more reviews - England's morning to forget

These features will arrive on "select TCL devices" first, and other Google TV devices "over the coming months". First, you'll be able to use Gemini to search through your Google Photos library for specific people â€¦
